onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: We are so close to the end of the semester. Only a few more reviews and we will be done with BCIT!

onStartDialogue.speaker: Robert
onStartDialogue.speech: Geeze Tony, I thought that love coding and BCIT. Are you already tired of school?

onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: Kinda. I'm not gonna lie, the whole semester has been pretty tough. The program has really tested me to my limits.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Laura
onStartDialogue.speech: I agree, I just can't wait to finish the program. There are a bunch of new startups happening and I can't afford to wait any longer.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Robert
onStartDialogue.speech: Well, that means we have to finish this week to get to the finals first.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Laura
onStartDialogue.speech: That's true. We have to focus on this gigantic pile of homework first. We also have to practice our presentation as well.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: I'll get the fake audience setup. Gotta be ready for that anxiety-inducing presentation.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Robert
onStartDialogue.speech: Don't worry about it too much guys. I'll help you guys out.
